H0.text: What country connected the ironically named Bushehr plant, the first nuclear power station in the Middle East, to its national grid in Sep 2011. Egypt

H1.text: What country connected the ironically named Bushehr plant, the first nuclear power station in the Middle East, to its national grid in Sep 2011. Turkey

H3.text: What country connected the ironically named Bushehr plant, the first nuclear power station in the Middle East, to its national grid in Sep 2011. IrƒÅn

A4.text: The Bushehr Nuclear Power Plant is a nuclear power plant in Iran.

A5.text: The Bushehr plant started adding electricity to the national grid in September 2011.
